items.content_html: A simple React-based digital clock app that displays the current time and updates every second. It uses useState and useEffect to manage and update time dynamically, formatted with toLocaleTimeString(). Clean, lightweight, and great for learning React basics.
items.title: AYAZ-PNG/DigitalClock: A simple React-based digital clock app that displays the current time and updates every second. It uses useState and useEffect to manage and update time dynamically, formatted with toLocaleTimeString(). Clean, lightweight, and great for learning React basics.

items.content_html: got-scraping-client is a lightweight and efficient tool for web scraping tasks using the popular Got HTTP client. It simplifies data extraction from web pages by providing a straightforward API and built-in support for handling common challenges like pagination and rate limiting.

items.content_html: A lightweight REST API built with Express, Sequelize ORM, and SQLite3 that lets you create, read, update, delete, filter and sort support tickets, and manage their associations with customers and agents. Perfect for learning Sequelize CRUD operations, associations, and helper-driven data fetching in a simple, file-based database setup.
items.title: adityapandey141/Customer-Support-Ticketing-System-Backend-: A lightweight REST API built with Express, Sequelize ORM, and SQLite3 that lets you create, read, update, delete, filter and sort support tickets, and manage their associations with customers and agents. Perfect for learning Sequelize CRUD operations, associations, and helper-driven data fetching in a simple, file-based database setup.
